parameters.name: Underline
parameters.description: True to enable underlining, false to disable it

title: IModelDoc2.FontUnderline
description: Enables or disables underlining the selected notes, dimensions, and GTols.

parameters.name: Underline
parameters.description: True to enable underlining, false to disable it

remarks:
You can also use
ITextFormat
for full control of text formatting. Obtain ITextFormat using the appropriate GetTextFormat method (see index entry GetTextFormat for a list of available GetTextFormat methods).
